intro: Arcion, commonly known as the sea holly, is a genus of flowering plants belonging to the family Asteraceae. These plants are characterized by their distinctive, spiky leaves and showy, daisy-like flowers. They are typically found in coastal areas and can thrive in saline or brackish environments.
